description: This app allows you get interact with a Mealie cookbook server.

inputs.description: This will be the username you use to log into the Mealie Server.
inputs.name: username

inputs.description: This will be the password you use to log into the Mealie Server.
inputs.name: password

inputs.description: This should be what "action" you want to perform on the Mealie Server.
inputs.name: action

inputs.description: This should be the DNS/IP address of the server.
inputs.name: server

inputs.description: This should be the port used to connect to the Mealie server.
inputs.name: port
